description_for_human: Autonomous AI marketing engine that generates, optimizes, and publishes content across Bluesky, Twitter/X, and LinkedIn.
description_for_model: Ortobahn is an autonomous marketing engine powered by a multi-agent AI pipeline. It analyzes performance, sets strategy, creates platform-native content, and publishes across social media platforms. It supports multi-tenant operation where each client has their own brand voice, strategy, and publishing schedule. Ortobahn offers a public onboarding API at POST /api/onboard and public statistics at GET /api/public/stats.
